wikipedia_page.main: John Hely-Hutchinson, 3rd Earl of Donoughmore KP, PC (I) (1787 – 14 September 1851) was an Irish politician and peer.

response: * John Hely-Hutchinson, 3rd Earl of Donoughmore, 14 August 1832 – 14 September 1851
Donoughmore was the son of John Hely-Hutchinson, 3rd Earl of Donoughmore, and the Hon. Margaret, daughter of Luke Gardiner, 1st Viscount Mountjoy.
**John Hely-Hutchinson, 3rd Earl of Donoughmore (1787–1851), Irish politician
* John Hely-Hutchinson, 3rd Earl of Donoughmore (1787–1851), Irish politician and peer

link_mentions.page: List of Privy Counsellors of Ireland

response: On 26 October 1861 Tristram married Flora, younger daughter of the Very Rev. Thomas John de Burgh, Dean of Cloyne, by his wife Lady Annie-Louisa, sister of John Hely-Hutchinson, 3rd Earl of Donoughmore; they had two sons and two daughters. Tristram lived variously at Dalton Hill, Albury, Surrey, at Queen Anne's Mansions, St James's Park, London, and at The Elms, London Road, Hampton.
